caption.p: Evaluation of biochemical parameters in experimental groups. (a) ALP level on experimental groups, (b) Serum calcium level on experimental groups, (c) Estradiol levels on experimental groups, (d) Progesterone levels on experimental groups Data are express as Mean ± SEM. a,b,c: According to the posthoc Tukey test which used for intergroup comparisons, groups with same superscripted letters were not significantly different at α = 0.05( p ≥ .05). However, dissimilar letters indicate a significant difference ( p < .05). ac letters above the error bars of the histogram show no significant difference among mentioned group and a and c groups
